name: Subs.ro
description: This plugin allows you to download subtitles from Subs.ro for your movies and TV shows. You will need an API key from Subs.ro to use this plugin.

versions.changelog:
- fix: publish assets and auto-create release (#2)
- Update manifest.json for version 0.1.2
- chore: update api endpoint (#1)
- Update manifest.json for version 0.1.1

## What's Changed
* chore: update api endpoint by @replsv in https://github.com/replsv/jellyfin-subsro/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @replsv made their first contribution in https://github.com/replsv/jellyfin-subsro/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/replsv/jellyfin-subsro/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

Initial release
- Support for movies and TV series
- IMDb and TMDb ID-based search
- Smart episode matching for series archives
- Season range support
- Automatic format detection (ZIP/RAR)
- Translator information display
